title: Stuck in Loding page ,then put in LOW PRIORITY QUEUE
body:
I was stuck in Loading page with my team for long time . Next I was dropped out because my team mate remake the game. Then system put me in LOW PRIORITY QUEUE !!!! I have to wait for 20mins for 5 games! WTF@_@
I do not think i made any mistake? can anyone get same problem with me ? Can anyone help with my account??

replies.body:
It's not possible to gain a 5-game penalty from a single instance of disconnecting or connecting to a game late. It actually takes a *recent trend of disconnections* before you'll see such a penalty. Have you been experiencing this long loading issue frequently? If so,  I suspect your connection to the servers could be pretty unstable, so I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are okay.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I tried 3 different place where are company wifi ,home wire connection and a university wifi with Mac and my windows computer. All the game, Mac will give me notice that i have to re-connected. Some of game windows will give me same message as Mac, most of the game, windows shows nothing.
So you worked through all the steps in that connection guide and were still seeing issues on different networks *after* taking those steps?

Gotcha. At this point, I'd like to escalate this to our tech specialists who will be able to dive into some more advanced forms of troubleshooting in order to pinpoint the problem. I recommend running a set of logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach that logfile to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you run into issues.
